question_text: What is the main benefit of using third-party SMART analysis tools over reading raw data?
answer_options: They work faster than built-in SMART monitoring
They analyze raw data and provide easy-to-understand health assessments
They can repair failing drives automatically
They only work with enterprise-grade storage devices
correct_answer: They analyze raw data and provide easy-to-understand health assessments
explanation: Third-party SMART analysis tools take the complex raw SMART data and analyze it to provide user-friendly assessments of drive health. They can track trends over time and give clear warnings about potential drive failures.
